description:
Like more than a million passengers every month, use the SNCB app to make travelling in Belgium easier! It offers simplified navigation and new features for planning your journeys by train and with other public transports (STIB/MIVB, TEC and De Lijn). 

The app lets you calculate the best route to more than 500 rail stations, follow the trains in real time, find and purchase the cheapest ticket and much more.

JOURNEY PLANNING
• Calculate the best route from door to door and make your journeys faster thanks to geolocation.
• Save your recurring journeys as favourites and create shortcuts to your favourite places (home, work, nearby stations, etc.) for even more convenience.
• Check train, bus, tram and metro timetables (now also in real time) and never miss a connection.
• View the occupancy rate and composition of every train to ensure a more comfortable journey and smoother boarding.

TICKET PURCHASE
• Buy your train tickets, Multi, Flex Season Tickets, Brupass and De Lijn tickets in the app.
• Pay safely with Bancontact (if you have installed your banking app or Payconiq), Visa, MasterCard, American Express or Paypal.
• Retrieve your tickets and purchase history at any time.

TRAFFIC INFORMATION AND NOTIFICATIONS
• Follow train traffic in real time.
• Get notifications in case of disruptions or changes to your train (track change, delayed departure, ...).

Questions? Ask us 24/7.
Download the SNCB app now to make rail travel even easier.

Join the millions of riders who trust Uber for their everyday travel needs. Whether you’re running an errand across town or exploring a city far from home, getting there should be easy.

FIND THE RIDE YOU WANT
Find the perfect ride right at your fingertips! Uber is here to make your journey stress-free and enjoyable, whether you're requesting a taxi for a trip or arranging a train journey.

Pick from a wide range of travel options that the Uber app has to offer including:
UberX: Affordable, everyday rides
Lux: Luxury cars with top-rated drivers for premium travel experiences
Electric: Sustainable rides in electric vehicles for eco-friendly trips
UberXL: Rides for groups up to 6, perfect for family trips
Comfort: Newer cars with extra legroom to enhance your travel
Uber Pet: Ride with your pet
Reserve: Choose your exact pickup time up to 90 days in advance for planned trips
Exec: High-end cars with top-rated drivers, ideal for business travel
2-wheels: You can also bike or ride a scooter with the Uber app. Find a scooter to start riding today for quick trips
Assist: Special assistance from trained drivers for accessible travel
Access: Wheelchair accessible vehicles ensuring inclusivity in travel
Black Cab: travel with the iconic London taxi

UPFRONT PRICING
With Uber, you no longer need to worry about hidden costs or unexpected surprises. As you enter your destination in the app, you get upfront pricing and the estimated time of arrival, whether it's a taxi ride or train. 

SAFETY TOGETHER
Safety is a top priority at Uber. We have established comprehensive safety features to help ensure every rider and driver feels secure and comfortable in their travel and on trips.

AFFORDABLE PRICING
We’re doing all we can to make our pricing as transparent as possible.
Split Fare: Don’t worry about doing the math later—split the cost evenly while you’re still on the ride.

JOIN UBER ONE FOR EXCLUSIVE PERKS
Benefit from £0 Delivery Fee and up to 5% off eligible delivery and pickup orders, 5-10% off eligible rides, and £5 credit if our Latest Arrival Estimate on your order is off. Other fees & terms apply. For more details see uber.com/uberone.

RESERVE RIDES IN ADVANCE
Need a ride at a specific time? No problem! Uber allows you to reserve rides in advance, so you can plan your day with confidence. Extra wait time included to meet your ride. Cancel at no charge up to 60 minutes in advance.

TRAVEL
Get train, coach, and flight ticketing right on the Uber app. Get 10% back in Uber Credits and collect Avios when you book train, coach, and Eurostar trips. No booking fee. Make any flight flexible and refundable and avoid flight travel stress with flight disruption protection.

GO GREEN
Uber is committed to building a sustainable future for our cities. With a growing fleet of electric and hybrid vehicles, you can choose eco-friendly rides to reduce your carbon footprint.

RENT CARS
Whether you need a car today or later, the online booking experience will help you find the right vehicle for a family vacation, a weekend getaway, airport travel, and more. Get great prices & selection from the best rental companies.

MORE FEATURES
Delivery: Order food from your favourite restaurants through Uber Eats. Stock up on groceries, shop pharmacy, convenience, and pet supplies, and get them all delivered.
Uber Boat: Get fast, reliable river boat services in London. For commuters and visitors. Routes run from 24 piers across the capital.
Uber for Business: Manage and track business travel, meal programs, and more on one dashboard.

Uber is available in the following cities: London, Manchester, Leeds, Glasgow, and more. Check if Uber is available in your city at https://www.uber.com/cities. Stay updated on the latest news, promotions, and offers by following us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/uber and liking us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed.

With this App at your fingertips, Europe is at your feet.

We’re Ryanair, so of course you’ll find the lowest fares in Europe on our app. But you’ll also get handy extras like being able to check in while you’re on the move, a mobile boarding pass delivered straight to your phone and a choice of in-flight extras in one quick click.

So why are you still reading? Download it now and get flying!

Make getting around easier with Bolt! Whether you need a ride across town, an airport transfer, or a scooter to zip through traffic, our app makes it easy to move around confidently and conveniently.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT?
- Request a ride in seconds: enjoy safe, affordable rides with top-rated drivers.
- Transparent pricing: see your fare upfront so there are no surprises.
- Multiple payment options: pay securely using a credit/debit card, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or cash.

EASY ORDERING:
- Open the app and set your destination.
- Choose from various ride types to suit your needs (Comfort, Premium, Electric, XL, and more).
- Track your driver in real time.
- Arrive in comfort and rate your experience.

SAFETY FIRST:
Some of Bolt’s safety features require the app to run in the background.

- Emergency assist button: discreetly alert our Safety Team in case of emergencies.
- Audio trip recording: record audio during rides for added peace of mind.
- Private phone details: your contact information stays confidential when you call a driver.

PLAN AHEAD:
Need an airport transfer or an early morning ride? You can schedule your trip in advance from 30 minutes to 90 days before your expected pickup time.

*JOIN BOLT PLUS TO UNLOCK PREMIUM FEATURES!
Get the best of Bolt with Bolt Plus. Enjoy exclusive perks that save you time and money, making every ride smoother and more convenient.

*BOLT DRIVE:
We're committed to our carbon net zero goal by 2040. That's why we're increasing the lineup of electric and hybrid cars in Bolt Drive, our car-sharing service. You can also rent Bolt scooters and e-bikes via the app.

*DELIVER PACKAGES
Use the 'Send' ride type to arrange fast and convenient parcel delivery in your city.

Bolt is available in 50 countries and 600+ cities worldwide (see the full list at https://bolt.eu/en/cities/). We rebranded from Taxify to Bolt in 2019.

Bolt is the perfect taxi alternative for fast, reliable, and affordable rides. The app provides a seamless ride-ordering experience whether you’re commuting, travelling, or running errands. So, the next time you need a ride, choose Bolt!

*Bolt options differ by location. Check the app for availability in your city.

Earn money driving with the Bolt Driver app. Sign up: https://bolt.eu/driver/

Questions? Get in touch via info@bolt.eu or at https://bolt.eu

Follow us on social media for updates, discounts, and offers!

Facebook — https://www.facebook.com/Bolt/
Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/bolt
X — https://x.com/Boltapp

Download the highest-rated travel app and join thousands of people finding hotel, motel and holiday home travel deals. Find a stay for your holiday, weekend getaway or business trip, anywhere in the world!

Search for hotels, motels & holiday homes

• 27 million hotels, holiday rentals, homes, apartments and other unique places to stay
• Search by city, attraction, landmark or hotel name with just one tap
• Filter by price, review score, amenities and other things important to you
• Find your last-minute stay or book far in advance

Find a great travel deal

• Daily deals for every budget
• Free cancellation on most rooms
• Browse over 135 million verified guest reviews

Manage your booking on the go

• Get paperless confirmation
• Make changes whenever, wherever
• 24/7 customer service in more than 40 languages
• Contact your host, view check-in times and write reviews
• No booking or credit card fees

Looking for a good restaurant, relaxing wellness resort, an exciting amusement park or a nice hotel stay with a discount? With the Social Deal app you have the best daily deals at your fingertips. Thanks to the wide range of offers there’s always something for everyone!

* WIN THE BLACK FRIDAY VOUCHER WORTH €1.000 CASH?
Join now for free! Download the free Social Deal app for a chance to win that Black Friday Voucher worth €1.000 cash (tax-free and free to spend).

This is how you join:
1. Download the Social Deal app
2. Get your free voucher
Good job! You now automatically have a chance to win! 

* ADVANTAGES OF OUR APP
1. The best deals: discover the best restaurant deals, hotel deals, wellness deals, amusement park deals and much more.
2. Download for free: download our app for free and never miss a (local) daily offer.
3. Always a discount: always benefit from a nice discount ranging from 30 to 70%
4. All deals are at your fingertips: find deals in your area and discover what other cities in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany have to offer!
5. Favourites: save your favourite deals and look them up whenever you want to
6. Easy booking: with one click you can easily book a table at your favourite restaurant or a relaxing massage.
7. Vouchers always at hand: with the app you always have your vouchers with you. Have your voucher scanned from the app and enjoy your Social Deal.

Going out for dinner tonight?
Have access to over 5.000 restaurants for a last-minute dinner: see where you can have dinner for an interesting price and quickly book the last available table for tonight with a discount!

How does it work?
- Via Social Deal you can find deals with discounts of up to 70% in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany.
- Select the desired number of vouchers and pay easily with iDEAL, PayPal, credit card or Bancontact.
- After paying you will find your voucher directly in the app and you can start enjoying your Social Deal.

Whether you are looking for a discount on hotels, tickets for exciting theme parks, a cheap ticket for a relaxing spa or discount at a good restaurant: with the wide range of daily new offers there’s something for everyone!

* Have a question for us?
Our customer service is available from Monday to Friday from 8 am to 11 pm and in the weekends from 9 am to 9 pm via:
- Telephone: 088 - 205 05 05
- Email: klantenservice@socialdeal.nl
- WhatsApp: 06 - 87 24 24 86

Use Social Deal just like the other 5.000.000+ active members and discover the best deals in your area!

* Help us improve the app
Enthusiastic about our app? Please leave a review! A motivated team works hard everyday to make sure you get the best ease of use. This is why Social Deal regularly issues updates. Make sure you always have the latest update downloaded and benefit from a fast and optimised app!

If the app doesn’t function properly or if you have a suggestion to make the Social Deal app even better, then call 088 - 205 05 05 or send an email to klantenservice@socialdeal.nl.

Note that Apple is no way involved with the content provided in this app, including contests and lotteries.

Plan your multimodal journey in Flanders with this app from De Lijn.

Specifications:
- Plan route from A to B in Flanders (De Lijn, MIVB-STIB, NMBS-SNCB, TEC)
- Check real-time arrivals at a stop
- Set personal stop alert
- Activate route for guidance from departure to arrival with relevant information about unexpected hold-ups, etc.
- Buy digital tickets
- Save routes and stops for easy reuse
- Find nearby stops
- Synchronise favourites with the website via your account

AIRBNB MORE THAN AN AIRBNB
The world is endlessly interesting and with Airbnb, you can explore it in more ways than ever. Find remarkable homes, unforgettable experiences and incredible services all in one app. Get inspired, book and go.

BOOK A HOME AND GO WHERE HOTELS CAN’T
Explore 8+ million holiday rentals in 240+ countries and regions to find the perfect stay for every kind of trip, whether you’re travelling alone or with a group. Use over 80 filtering options to find the amenities you want, like a pool, a kitchen or accessibility features like step-free entry. View all the details of a place at a glance on the listing page and check out the ratings and reviews to see what other guests who’ve stayed there think about it too.

DON’T JUST SEE A PLACE, EXPERIENCE IT
Find thousands of experiences around the world, hosted by locals who know their city best – all vetted for quality based on a host’s expertise, reputation and authenticity. Uncover unique perspectives on landmarks and museums. Get a taste of local cuisine through cooking classes and food tours. Enjoy the great outdoors, an art workshop, a live performance and much more. Plus, check out Airbnb Originals – extraordinary experiences hosted by the world’s most interesting people, designed exclusively for Airbnb.

MAKE YOUR STAY EVEN MORE SPECIAL WITH INCREDIBLE SERVICES
Make the most of your stay by booking incredible services right at your Airbnb, like private chefs, photography, catering, prepared meals, hairstyling, nail treatments, make-up, massages, personal training and spa treatments – each offered by experienced service hosts who have been vetted for quality. You can book thousands of professional services at nearly every price, all in one app, all over the world. Best of all, you don’t need to stay at an Airbnb or even be on a trip to get these services. Schedule a blow-dry, training session and more right at home.

GET A TRAVEL APP THAT TRAVELS WITH YOU
After you book a home, you’ll get personalised recommendations on the home page suggesting services and experiences for your trip, tailored to where you’re staying and who you’re travelling with. And the redesigned Profile gives you a snapshot of all the places you’ve been to on Airbnb and the people you’ve met along the way.

FIND ALL YOUR TRIP INFO IN ONE PLACE
Quickly find or share the details of your reservation – making it easier for everyone to get there, get inside and get connected to wifi with just a tap. Our in-app messaging means every guest on the trip can easily communicate with hosts to say hi, ask questions and receive up-to-the-minute booking updates. You can also share photos, videos and even customise an Airbnb Service, all in the same chat. And with a day-by-day view of everything you’ve booked in the updated Trips tab, it’s simple to keep track of your plans and get key details like check-in times, special instructions and entry codes all in one place, even when you’re offline.

WANT TO HOST? AIRBNB MAKES IT EASY.
Whether you want to host a home, experience or service, you can reach millions of people travelling and grow your business on Airbnb. List your home in a few simple steps. Or, you can apply to host an experience or service and once approved, you’re ready to welcome the world.

YOU’VE COME THIS FAR – NOW GO FURTHER
Stop reading and fire up the app to book yourself a one-of-a-kind trip on Airbnb.

Over 10 million explorers have chosen Polarsteps to plan, track and relive their travels. This all-in-one travel app shows you the world’s most enticing travel destinations, gives you insider tips and plots your route, locations and photos when the journey is underway. The result? A beautiful digital world map that is unique to you! As well as the chance to turn it all into a hardback Travel Book when you’re done. And it doesn’t stop there...

Record your route automatically, keeping your phone in your pocket and eyes on the world. Doesn’t drain your battery, works offline and you have full privacy control.

PLAN

■ Polarsteps Guides, created by our travel-loving editors and other explorers like you, show you the best of the world (as well as giving you top tips for once you get there).
■ Itinerary Planner to build your dream (editable) itinerary.
■ Transport Planner helping you get from A to B with clear transport options between destinations.

TRACK

■ Automatically track and plot your path on a digital world map (that grows fuller as your passport does).
■ Add photos, video, and thoughts to your steps along the way making your memories all the more vivid.
■ Save spots that you love so that you can always find your way back.

SHARE

■ Leave tips for the travelling community on where to go and what to see.
■ Share your journey with friends and family if you want to. Or keep it to yourself. You have full privacy controls.
■ Follow others and share in their adventures.

RELIVE

■ Retrace your steps – scrolling through places, photos, and your travel stats.
■ Create a unique Travel Book filled with your pictures and stories with the touch of a button.

WHAT THE PRESS ARE SAYING ABOUT POLARSTEPS

"The Polarsteps app replaces your travel journal, making it easier and more beautiful." - National Geographic

"Polarsteps helps you track and share your journeys in an easy and visually appealing way." - The Next Web

"Polarsteps' resulting travel log is impressive, and is the source of a severe case of itchy feet in your correspondent." - TechCrunch

FEEDBACK

Questions, thoughts, or feedback? We'd love to hear what you think about Polarsteps. Get in touch via support.polarsteps.com/contact

Create and collaborate on immersive, data-driven maps from anywhere, with the new Google Earth.
See the world from above with high-resolution satellite imagery, explore 3D terrain and buildings in hundreds of cities, and dive in to streets and neighbourhoods with Street View's 360° perspectives.

The STIB-MIVB app is all you need to get around Brussels by metro, bus, tram or train. New: you can now purchase your tickets in the app. Click and go with the STIB-MIVB app 

Buy tickets and be on your way immediately
- Your ticket is immediately available in the app. Quick and easy!
- You can buy your tickets whenever and wherever you want. This way, you always have a ticket in your pocket.
- You can purchase Brupass (XL) 1 or 10 journeys via the app. If you take public transport every now and then, buying a 10 journey ticket is a tad cheaper. How nice is that?

Stay tuned
- Keep up to date with the app: you'll find real-time info not only on the STIB-MIVB network, but also on SNCB-NMBS trains and TEC and De Lijn buses. So you always know when to leave!
- Save your favourite lines and stops and find your way around the app and Brussels even more easily.  

Find the route that suits you best
- Plan your journey from A to Z and choose your own departure date and time.
- The interactive map also indicates De Lijn, SNCB-NMBS and TEC stops with real-time departure times. Never miss a connection again.
- The shortest route, with the fewest connections or the least amount of walking? You're in control of your preferences.

Reload and consult your MOBIB card
- Connect your MOBIB card to the app and see how many journeys you have left or how long your season ticket is still valid.
- Whether you have a season ticket or a ticket, you can simply reload your MOBIB card via the app. Please note that it will take at least 24 hours before your ticket or season ticket is available on your MOBIB card.

Travel smoothly
- Would you like to know in advance whether the escalator or lift is working? Via the "Info" tab, you can see in real time how accessible the station is.
- For buses and tram lines 7 and 9, the app tells you the degree to which a stop is accessible.

Download the STIB-MIVB app now and enjoy worry-free travel in and around Brussels!

The Brussels App lets you book flights, choose seats and get your boarding passes in order. It is the perfect mobile travel partner and gives you peace of mind so you know your journey will go off without a hitch. 


Once you’ve got the Brussels App, you’ll receive push notifications as well as real-time flight information, important flight status updates and relevant offers straight to your smartphone. This way you won’t miss out on any last-minute changes to your journey.


The Brussels App accompanies you the whole time, from the minute you book your flight to when you land at your destination and even afterward to make sure the whole experience is as seamless as possible. Simply access your personal profile if you need to make any changes to your information.
The Brussels App ensures you’re well looked after throughout the entire flight experience.


Here are the main features of the Brussels App:



Before the flight
•	Book flights, add baggage and choose seats: Purchase the flight that best suits you and even add a rental car if you need to. You can also add baggage and reserve or change your seat.
•	Online check-in: The Brussels App enables you to check in for all flights operated by Lufthansa Group Network Airlines. Your mobile boarding pass will then appear on your smartphone and can be accessed easily.
•	Travel ID and Brussels Miles and More: You can store various payment methods in your Travel ID account with the new digital wallet, making it easy to pay anytime, anywhere. Your Travel ID or Brussels Miles & More account can be used for personalized services. You can save your personal information in the Brussels App for better accessibility.
•	Real-time information and flight status: From 24 hours before your flight, you will be provided with important details and updates about your journey thanks to your mobile travel companion. Notifications for check-in and the flight status will pop up on your home screen as well as any gate changes so you won’t miss out on any news. This way you can rest assured that you’re up to date with all your flight information.

During the flight

•	Flight ticket and onboard services: You always have your mobile boarding pass and onboard services to hand thanks to the Brussels App – even when you don’t have internet access. All relevant flight information is at your fingertips, so you know your flight status without having to ask the flight crew.


After the flight
•	Track baggage: Your digital travel companion will still be at your side even after you’ve arrived at your destination. Locate your checked-in baggage in the app and stay informed about the subsequent parts of your trip.


The Brussels App is the perfect chaperone for a flawless travel experience. It has never been easier to book your flights and rental cars via the app, receive notifications and updates about upcoming flights, and manage your personal data effortlessly all while on the go.


Get your hands on the Brussels App now and see how it can improve your travel experience! It’s at your side before, during and after your flight.


Check out brusselsairlines.com and follow us on Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and X to stay up to date with the latest news and flight offers.


If you have any questions or need our help, please get in touch with us. You can contact us at https://www.brusselsairlines.com/be/en/contact.

Skyscanner makes planning your next trip easy. Find the best prices on flights, hotels & rental cars – all in one place.

No matter where you are – search for cheap airline tickets, low-cost flights, and the best air fare deals to destinations worldwide. Easily find and book flights, Hotels and car hire with major airlines and providers  like Ryanair, easyJet, British Airways all in one place.  Save time and money by comparing fares across multiple airlines and travel booking platforms to get the best price. There are no booking fees or hidden charges—just the lowest prices on domestic and international flights.

But Skyscanner is more than just flights. Find budget-friendly hotels, luxury resorts, airport hotels, and holiday rentals with our hotel search, ensuring you have the perfect place to stay wherever you go. Need transportation? Compare and book affordable car hire from top providers, with options to filter by vehicle type, fuel policy, and more.
Here’s how to use our app:

Find inspiration
Can’t decide where to go? Start by exploring everywhere first. Tap ‘Everywhere’ in our search bar to find low-cost flights literally anywhere around the world and get ideas for your next holiday.

Filter your search
Know what you’re looking for? Use our smart filters to search by flight duration, airline, number of stops, travel class, departure and arrival times. Looking for last-minute travel deals? Use filters to find flexible options and spontaneous getaways at the lowest prices.

The best time to fly
You’ve chosen where it will be, now to find the best dates to book your holiday. Our calendar view breaks down the cheapest dates in a chosen month so you can find the right flight deal. Not ready to book yet? Set up a Price Alert and we’ll let you know when the flight price changes so you’re always booking at the right time.

The right hotel at the right price
Thought we were just about discounted flights? Nope, we’ve got your stay covered too. Compare and book budget hotels, luxury resorts, holiday apartment rentals , motels and hostels all over the world. Or find rooms near your current location and grab a last-minute hotel deal for your next holiday. 

Hire a car
Choose where and when to pick up your car hire, and we’ll show you affordable options from top car hire agencies, including Hertz, Avis, Enterprise and Europcar . You can filter your search by vehicle type, fuel type and features. And our Fair Fuel Policy flag will make sure you’re not paying too much on fuel – we’ve got your back. 

Book with who you trust
Compare all your top travel and airlines, including online travel agencies (OTA), in one place - easyJet, Ryanair, British Airways, Lufthansa, Wizz Air, Expedia, Booking.com, lastminute.com and more. Plus, get recent reviews on our travel partners from our community of travellers. 

No added fees ever
Did we mention we don’t charge any booking fees? Never. None at all. Book directly with airlines, hotels, and travel agency services with total transparency.

Save your flights
Want to look but not ready to book a flight? No problem. We have a ‘saved’ feature where you can ‘heart’ flights or hotels you like. Then it’ll show up on your trips, so you can pick up where you left off and book your holiday. 

Why Skyscanner?
• The Telegraph; “The only 20 travel apps you’ll ever need”
• The New York Times; “Apps for Travelers Dreaming of Their Next Trip”
• Elite Daily; “7 holiday travel apps that’ll let you jingle around the world’
• Pocket-lint; “4 apps to get you ready for summer”
	
Let’s get social
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/skyscanner 
• Instagram: @skyscanner 
• X: @skyscanner
• TikTok: @skyscanner
• LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/skyscanner/ 
• Website: www.skyscanner.net

The Eurostar app is your essential travel companion for seamless European journeys.
Easily book train tickets, check train times, and manage your trips – all in one place. 

Find the best deals on cheap train tickets, discover Train + Hotel packages, and get inspired for your next train journey across Europe. Whether you’re planning a weekend away or a longer adventure, the app makes travelling simple, fast and stress-free. Available in English, French, Dutch and German.

What you can do with the Eurostar app

BOOK TRAIN TICKETS & PACKAGES
Book seats to over 100 destinations in France, Belgium, the Netherlands and Germany – including train tickets from London to Paris. You can now also book Train + Hotel packages to combine your travel and accommodation in one step.

STORE YOUR EUROSTAR TICKETS
Keep your Eurostar tickets safe in the app or save them to your Apple Wallet for quick access.

FIND CHEAP TRAIN TICKETS
Discover the best fares across Europe with our Low Fare Finder and secure train tickets in Europe at great prices.

MANAGE BOOKINGS
Change your travel dates, seats or journey details quickly and easily, wherever you are.

ACCESS CLUB EUROSTAR BENEFITS
Check your Club Eurostar points balance, redeem rewards, and enjoy exclusive benefits like lounge access and priority gates (for eligible members).

RECEIVE LIVE UPDATES
Enable notifications to get real-time train times, travel alerts and special offers.

Download the Eurostar app today to plan your next train journey and explore Europe with ease.

With a modern design and intuitive user guidance features, the My BMW App is made to help you navigate a completely new mobility experience. Check the status of your BMW, use one of the many remote control features, plan trips in advance, book your next service appointment, or discover the world of BMW – all from the convenience of your smartphone.

The My BMW App at a glance:
•Immediate access to vehicle status and functions
•Smart e-mobility services
•Extensive navigation and map features for planning trips 
•Stories and news from the world of BMW
•Direct access to your BMW Service
•Use app in demo mode even without owning vehicle
•Regular updates and upgrades for all features

Discover the highlights of the My BMW App:

CHECK YOUR VEHICLE STATUS 
“All Good” – The My BMW App provides you with an overview of crucial status information like your BMW’s drive-ready state, enabling you to:
•View your vehicle's location
•Check your current fuel level and range
•Check that doors and windows are locked
•Keep vehicle software up to date

OPERATE YOUR VEHICLE REMOTELY 
Control the functions of your BMW directly from your smartphone: 
•Schedule and activate air conditioning
•Lock and unlock the doors, operate the horn and flashers
•Record images from the vehicle environment
•Set up your BMW Digital Key

PLAN TRIPS 
Search for and send locations directly to the navigation system, including destinations, filling and charging stations, and car parks:
•Plan trips and keep an eye on the traffic situation
•Detailed information on filling stations and charging stations
•Find parking at your destination
•Consider charging stop and times in load-optimized route planning

ENHANCED ELECTROMOBILITY 
Smart support of your electromobility for range planning and charging management:
•Plan electric range and charging
•Find charging stations nearby
•View your charging history at any time
•Manage and redeem BMW Points

EXPLORE THE WORLD OF BMW
Stay up to date and find the right products for your BMW:
•Discover exclusive stories and news from BMW
•Receive messages in the Message Center
•Link directly to the BMW Shop and BMW Financial Services

MANAGE REQUIRED SERVICES
The My BMW App is your direct line to your retailer if service is needed:
•Keep an eye on required services
•Book service appointments via the app
•View maintenance and repair requirements by video

EXPERIENCE THE My BMW APP WITH DEMO MODE
Explore the benefits of the My BMW app even without owning a vehicle:
• Select an attractive BMW demo vehicle in the app garage
• Get to know the variety of app functions, e.g. for electric mobility
• Use of My BMW app to get you into the world of BMW

Download the My BMW App now and  try out its many features.

The My BMW App is optimised for vehicles built from 2014 onwards. The availability of individual app functions depends on your vehicle equipment and your BMW ConnectedDrive contract. The availability of app functions may vary between countries.

Book your Thalys, Eurostar, TGV, ICE and IC train tickets on your smartphone.

Book your international train tickets to thousands of European destinations such as London, Paris, Amsterdam and Cologne easily via the SNCB International app. You can now travel with your mobile train tickets on your smartphone.

BOOK YOUR INTERNATIONAL TICKETS

-	Book tickets for Thalys, Eurostar, TGV, ICE and IC trains.
-	With your mobile train ticket, you can travel to thousands of European destinations such as London, Paris, Amsterdam and Cologne.
-	Secure payment by credit card and with the Bancontact app.

YOUR MOBILE TICKET

-	Get your mobile train tickets sent straight to your smartphone in barcode form.
-	View or scan your mobile train tickets (no internet connection needed).
-	Download a PDF version of your ticket via the "My tickets" tab if needed.
-	Exchange your train tickets at our Contact Centre using the "click-to-call" function in the “My tickets” tab (open 7 days a week).

NEW FEATURES

-	Brand-new look and design.
-	More info on train stations.

Holafly is your best travel companion. Stay connected wherever you go with Holafly's eSIM cards and enjoy Data plans worldwide.

What is an eSIM card?

An eSIM card provides mobile data like a regular SIM card but is digital and international, eliminating expensive roaming fees. You can use an eSIM alongside your local SIM card to receive FaceTime calls, iMessages or WhatsApp messages with your regular number.

Why Choose Holafly?

Holafly is your go-to international prepaid eSIM provider, offering Data with quick, easy connectivity.

With Holafly’s eSIM, you get:

Connection Anywhere, Anytime 
Enjoy fast, reliable Internet access during your international travels in over 200 destinations, with multiple plan options, that can be adapted to the days of your trip. Connect to the internet within minutes and enhance your travel experience.

Cost-Effective Connectivity 
Travel without the fear of extra expenses. Holafly offers prepaid eSIM cards with Data coverage in over 200 destinations, including Europe, Mexico, China, Turkey, Japan, and the USA. You can also purchase limited data plans for other destinations and top-ups for extra data.

Easy Installation & Activation
Purchase your eSIM through the Holafly App with Apple Pay, Credit card or PayPal. Receive your eSIM in your email within just seconds. Install your eSIM seamlessly through the Holaly App with the help of our guides, videos, and offline content. The eSIM data will only start to be consumed once at your destination.

Data Plan Insights
Track your eSIM data usage, activation, and expiration dates through the app of one or multiple eSIMs. Top-up your eSIMs anytime you need extra data.

Universal Compatibility
Holafly's eSIM is compatible with all iPhones with technology-enabled eSIM (from iPhone XS, XR onwards). Check our compatibility guide for details.

Choose your local payment method 
Users in the UK can now pay with Trustly. In addition, people from Belgium, the Netherlands, Portugal, Finland, and France will now be able to buy with their local payment method. More countries will soon join the list.

How to Buy an eSIM?

Choose Your Plan
Download the app and choose your destination, select a plan according to your travel schedule, and continue to checkout (you can save your payment information for later purchases). You’ll receive your eSIM via email in seconds and can log in to the app to manage and set up your card.

Set Up Your eSIM
Install and activate your eSIM through the app. Log in using your email or your Apple account (make sure it matches the one you used for purchase). For iOS 17.4+ users, enjoy one-button installation. Alternatively, use QR or manual codes for setup, you can find step-by-step guides in our app; they are also sent by email.

Activate Your Data
Once you finish installing your eSIM, activate data roaming. Data will only start consuming once at your destination. Track data usage in real-time within the app of all your available eSIMs. That’s it! Start enjoying internet connectivity for all your trips.

24/7 Support
Need help? Contact our multilingual support team anytime inside the app with one button. We’re here to assist with the eSIM setup and any other questions.

Embark on your adventures with Holafly – made with love by people who love to travel. Stay connected worldwide—download the Holafly App now!

Stay connected wherever you travel. With an Airalo eSIM (digital SIM), you can connect like a local in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Install an eSIM and get online in minutes. No roaming fees — just easy, affordable, global connectivity.

What is an eSIM?
An eSIM is an embedded SIM card. It's built into your phone's hardware and functions like a physical SIM. But it works 100% digitally.

Instead of dealing with a physical SIM card, you can purchase an eSIM, install it on your device, and instantly connect to a mobile network at your destination.

What is an Airalo eSIM plan?
An Airalo eSIM plan gives you access to mobile data, call, and text services. You can choose a prepaid local, regional, or global eSIM plan to get online in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Simply download an eSIM, install it on your device, and connect to a mobile network when you arrive at your destination!

How does it work?
1. Install the Airalo app.
2. Purchase an eSIM plan for your travel destination.
3. Install the eSIM.
4. Turn on your eSIM and connect to the internet upon arrival.

Available for 200+ countries and regions, including: 
- United States
- United Kingdom
- Turkey
- Italy
- France
- Spain
- Japan
- Germany
- Canada
- Thailand
- Portugal
- Morocco
- Colombia
- India
- South Africa

Why Airalo?
- Stay connected in 200+ countries and regions.
- Install and activate an eSIM in minutes.
- Affordable eSIM plans with no hidden fees.
- Choose from local, regional, and global eSIMs.
- Call, text, and access data with a Discover+ global eSIM.

Why travelers love eSIMs:
- Easy, affordable, instant connectivity.
- 100% digital. No need to fuss with physical SIM cards or Wi-Fi devices.
- No hidden fees or surprise roaming charges.
- Store multiple eSIMs on a single device.
- Add and switch eSIM plans on the go.


eSIM FAQ
What does an Airalo eSIM plan come with?
- An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
- eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
- Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details. 

What devices are ready?
- You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim 

Who is Airalo best for?
- Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
- Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
- Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.
- Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
Yes! Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).


Happy travels!

–

Airalo Blog: www.airalo.com/blog
Help Center: www.airalo.com/help

EasyPark has been making cities more livable since 2001. With millions of drivers, businesses, and operators using our services in more than 20 countries, we continue to develop convenient, easy-to-use solutions to save you time, and money and remove the unnecessary stress of car parking.

EasyPark is the nr. 1 parking app in Europe when it comes to coverage. With our mobile parking solution, you can pay for parking in a garage or find a parking spot in the street, in the city center or in the airport, at home or abroad - wherever life takes you! You can also charge your EV, and go even further.

Price: In most locations, we charge a service fee on top of the parking cost the operator charges. The total price and fee breakdown are shown in the EasyPark app when you set your end time and before you start to park, as well as in your parking receipt when the session has ended, so you are confident about how much you’re paying. Please see your local easypark.com site for more details.

With the EasyPark app, you can:
- Start your session from your mobile phone.
- Stop your session at any time, paying for the active time.
- Remotely extend your session if you need more time.
- Find parking near your location or destination before traveling.
- Charge your electric car with the same app.
- Pay for parking, whether privately or for work.
- Split your private and work-related parking or charging costs.
- Pay with secure methods such as Visa, Mastercard, ApplePay, or monthly invoices for business accounts.
- Get notified when your parking is close to expiration.

You can pay for parking and EV charging with the EasyPark app in: Rome, Madrid, Melbourne, Berlin, Copenhagen, Paris, Amsterdam, Stockholm, Helsinki and so many more!

Please note that the EasyPark app is unavailable in the United Kingdom. To park in the UK, please use the RingGo app instead.

Roamy — turn saved posts into real trips

Thousands of travel videos saved across your Instagram and TikTok… and zero time to turn them into a plan? You can’t search those folders, you keep rewatching clips to find the exact spot, pinning places on Google Maps takes forever, and spreadsheets don’t tell you how far anything is. We get it. Trip planning from scratch is painful—and your saved folder is begging to be used.

Roamy fixes the mess. With one tap, pull every location mentioned in a video, drop them onto a map, and see your entire collection of spots—clearly, visually, and all in one place. When you’re ready to go, just tell Roamy how many days you have. We’ll build a sensible, day-by-day itinerary that connects the dots for you. Trip planning, minus the stress.

Who Roamy is for
- You’ve got dozens of folders and thousands of saved travel posts across Instagram and TikTok.
- You love picking the spots—but hate the logistics.
- You want everything in one place: your saved locations, a clean map, and a plan that actually fits your days.

How it works

- 1-tap save from socials: Import places from TikTok/Instagram with a single click. Roamy detects locations mentioned in the video and adds them for you.
- See everything on a map: No more scattered folders or notes. Your saved spots appear on a clean map so you can visualize your trip at a glance.
- Your master collection: Keep every restaurant, landmark, café, and hidden gem in one organized list—with links back to the original posts and reviews.
- Get your perfect itinerary: Tell Roamy your trip length and we’ll arrange your days into a logical route so you’re not zig-zagging across town.
- Duplicate & share trips: Copy community guides or friends’ itineraries and customize them to your style—or share your own with a link.
- Review & go: Tap any spot for details, tips, and prep notes so you know exactly why it’s on your list.

Why people love it
- Turns chaos into clarity: Your social saves become a visual, actionable plan.
- Saves hours: Stop rewatching videos and manually pinning.
- Keeps your taste: It’s your collection—Roamy just organizes it and makes it trip-ready.
- Stress-free planning: From “I saved it” to “I’m going” in a few taps

Got somewhere to be? Take a Dott!
Simply unlock an e-bike or e-scooter in the Dott app, ride to your destination, and get on with your day – easy as that. 
To get started:
1. Download the Dott app
2. Check the in-app map to find a nearby e-scooter or e-bike
3. Scan the vehicle’s QR code to unlock it, and you’re off!
Pro tip: Grab a Dott pass to save on your ride. Or simply pay as you go with your secure payment method of choice.


Why choose Dott?
Dott is the simplest way to move around your city, safely and efficiently. Ditch the crowded commute and enjoy traveling in the open air. Avoid traffic jams and arrive at your destination on time – for a fraction of the cost of a taxi or car share.
Our e-scooters and e-bikes are available 24/7, making moving around your city a breeze! They’re brought in for regular maintenance and boast all the latest safety features. Plus, thanks to the smooth electric acceleration, riding our vehicles is a piece of cake.

Ride a Dott whenever you're:
* Meeting a friend for dinner
* Commuting to work
* Heading to class
* Going on a date
* Exploring your city on your day off, or sightseeing in other countries


Get around without breaking the bank
Simply pay for your rides as you go, at a price similar to public transport. Or, explore Dott passes to ride more for less: grab a pass for 24 hours, a week, or even a month to save on every ride. If you fancy a ride for free, just refer a friend and you’ll both get a free ride each! Want in on even more discounts? Turn on notifications to hear about our limited-time deals.

Where you’ll find us
Dott is currently available in 40 cities across Israel and Europe – with more on the way! Want to see Dott in your city? Drop us a line at support@ridedott.com.

With the TUI fly app everything you need for a flight with TUI fly is at your fingertips! With this app it's easy to book your flights, check your flight schedule and view up-to-date flight times. ADD YOUR FLIGHT

Welcome to the FlixBus app!


We are thrilled to announce that FlixBus, the world's largest bus network, is now available in India! 


With FlixBus, you can effortlessly book bus tickets from all our brands including FlixBus, Greyhound, Kamil Koç and FlixTrain, across Europe, North America, India, and South America. 


Easy and Sustainable Travel 

FlixBus simplifies travel by offering convenient and eco-friendly options. With the FlixBus app you can book bus tickets across Europe, North America, South America and India. 


Looking for travel inspiration?

Explore our route map and live timetables to find your next destination, whether you are looking for an exciting adventure in a bustling city or a tranquil getaway, FlixBus has you covered.


Why Choose the FlixBus App?
•	Keep all your bus tickets in one place.
•	Receive exclusive discounts only available on the app.
•	Quickly discover the cheapest bus tickets to your chosen destination.
•	Use the app to locate your stop effortlessly and navigate your way to it.
•	Travel without luggage hassles: enjoy one free checked bag and one carry-on with each ticket.
•	Reserve seats, book additional baggage, and manage your bookings effortlessly within the app.
•	Book bus tickets well in advance or opt for same-day travel for spontaneous trips.
•	Receive important trip updates directly to your phone. Stay up to date on delays or stop changes.
•	Whether you’ve lost something or have questions, our app has you covered with FAQs and convenient contact options.
•	Benefit from the extensive reach of the world's largest bus network.

How to book a bus ticket with FlixBus?

It's easy to buy a bus ticket with the FlixBus app: simply select your departure and arrival cities, pick your date to travel and then checkout with your preferred payment method! After booking you will receive a booking confirmation by email containing all your trip details


Why Travel with FlixBus?

Travel with FlixBus for a journey that combines comfort, safety, and convenience. Our buses are equipped with adjustable seats, air conditioning, personal power outlets, free Wi-Fi and onboard toilets. Safety is a priority for us, so rest assured that your journey will be in capable hands.
No need to worry about packing light - FlixBus offers a generous luggage policy: carry one 7kg bag (30cm x 18cm x 42cm), and one 20kg checked bag (50cm x 30cm x 80cm). Need more? Add an extra bag of carry-on dimensions directly through our app. Travel comfortably, knowing your belongings you don’t have to pack light.


Live Tracking and Timetables

Stay informed in real time with our live coach times and bus tracking features. Easily access e-tickets, keep an eye on live bus times while waiting for your bus, and track the progress of your journey. Use our live timetables to conveniently plan trips that fit your schedule and receive updates directly in the app.


Green Travel Initiative

FlixBus is dedicated to eco-friendly travel. We continuously strive to reduce our ecological footprint by using the latest environmentally friendly buses, optimizing routes, and utilizing efficient driving techniques. Our commitment to sustainability means every journey you take with us contributes to a greener future.


Join us on a journey that's not just about reaching your destination, but also about traveling responsibly and comfortably. With FlixBus, every trip is an experience.
